name: vouchervault
description: VoucherVault is a self-hosted manager for discount codes, gift cards, and vouchers. It tracks balances, expiry dates, and usage, helping keep personal or family vouchers organized.
features: Voucher tracking: Store and organize discount codes, gift cards, and vouchers in one place.
Balance management: Track remaining balances on gift cards and vouchers.
Expiry tracking: Monitor expiration dates and receive alerts before vouchers expire.
Usage history: Record when and where vouchers were used for reference.
Category organization: Group vouchers by store, type, or custom categories.
Search functionality: Find specific vouchers quickly using search and filters.
Barcode storage: Store barcode images for easy scanning at checkout.
Notes: Add notes to vouchers for additional information or restrictions.
Family sharing: Share voucher information with family members for coordinated use.
Expiry alerts: Get notified when vouchers are approaching expiration to avoid waste.
Web interface: Manage vouchers through a straightforward web interface.
Privacy-focused: Keep all voucher information on your own server with complete control.
